analysis.description:
NZOCrowdsale.getTotalAmountOfTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x94eea9a484f0bae03d19623cfe389e2cba56b72f.sol#400-428) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- currentPeriod == 0
	- currentPeriod == (j + 1)

MintableToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x94eea9a484f0bae03d19623cfe389e2cba56b72f.sol#287-301) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/19/0x94eea9a484f0bae03d19623cfe389e2cba56b72f.sol#297-298)

ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0x94eea9a484f0bae03d19623cfe389e2cba56b72f.sol#63-65)
ERC20.transfersEnabled should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0x94eea9a484f0bae03d19623cfe389e2cba56b72f.sol#65)
NZOCrowdsale.addressFundFoundation should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0x94eea9a484f0bae03d19623cfe389e2cba56b72f.sol#347-352)
NZOCrowdsale.addressFundReserve should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0x94eea9a484f0bae03d19623cfe389e2cba56b72f.sol#346-347)
